name: Evolution (itch) (creative username)
description:
Evolution is a game all about change and adapting to your environment: you have three characters in which to choose from; the monkey: fast, light, he can jump high, and is great for movement. the Ape: he is slow and sluggish, but he makes up for it in his strength dealing massive punches that obliterate enimys. and finally the Human, he is faster and lighter than the ape but not as much as the monkey, he is armed with only his bow, ready to fire at a moments notice. you have fought for every ounce of survival in this jungle of your nightmares: giant snakes, rolly pollys (that one is not so scary to be honest) and bats that swoop on a moments notice, and other monsters; what lurks in the deep... you have to see him with your own eyes!

Evolution is a game created by a team of four junior developers under the name Team OwO biased out of the heart of Utah. there were some restrictions placed on the development no more than 2 buttons could be used in the game play, so the movement (instead of WASD) is dependent of the angle of your mouse to the character. the main game-play consists of switching between your three characters (monkey, ape, human) who all have their own advantages and disadvantages. the monkey is fast, and small, but has low health. the ape is slow and grounded, but he has a large health pool and when you press shift he deals a massive punch. the human is a middle ground of all the stats and comes with a ranged bow. with an assortment of enimys and even a final boss, just trust me this game is fun i swear.
